com.prc.alp.liaison.weather
Class WeatherTrigger

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.cougaar.domain.planning.ldm.trigger.Trigger
        |
        +--com.prc.alp.liaison.weather.WeatherTrigger
public class WeatherTrigger
extends org.cougaar.domain.planning.ldm.trigger.Trigger

Responds to the receipt and publishing of weather forecast information by a WeatherLiaisonPlugIn. It adjusts the itinerary of each PREPAREFORTRANSPORT task which could be affected by a given forecast. The adjustment is made so as to keep end time of the UNLOAD role unchanged; roles prior to the UNLOAD operation are pushed back in time (set to an earlier time) as needed to accomodate weather delays.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
See Also:
WeatherRequirementPlugIn, Serialized Form

Inner Class Summary
static class WeatherTrigger.Action
          An implementation of the TriggerAction interface that makes changes to the itineraries of PREPAREFORTRANSPORT tasks.
static class WeatherTrigger.Monitor
          An implementation of the TriggerMonitor interface that reacts to aggregated weather forecast tasks that have become stale.
static class WeatherTrigger.Tester
          A trival implementation of the TriggerTester interface that always returns true.
